daily_summary.headline: Crewed Mission and Aurora Opportunities Highlight the Day

top_events.title: Falcon 9 Block 5 | Crew-12
top_events.description: SpaceX Crew-12 is the twelfth crewed operational flight of a Crew Dragon spacecraft to the International Space Station as part of NASA's Commercial Crew Program.
top_events.action: Watch live on NASA's official webcast.

top_events.title: Aurora Viewing Opportunity
top_events.description: A G1 geomagnetic storm may provide aurora visibility at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check sky conditions if you are above 65° latitude.

top_events.title: Falcon 9 Block 5 | Starlink Group 17-34
top_events.description: Launch of a batch of 24 satellites for the Starlink mega-constellation.
top_events.action: Follow SpaceX's official webcast for live coverage.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
